information.author: Centreon

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor Hyper-V using NSClient Rest API protocol:
* Node-Integration-Service
* Node-Replication
* Node-Snapshot
* Scvmm-Integration-Service
* Scvmm-Snapshot
* Scvmm-Vm-Status

Pack Plugin pour surveiller Hyper-V en utilisant le protocole NSClient Rest API:
* Node-Integration-Service
* Node-Replication
* Node-Snapshot
* Scvmm-Integration-Service
* Scvmm-Snapshot
* Scvmm-Vm-Status

information.monitoring_procedure:
# The documentation page of this Plugin-Pack requires a newer version of the Plugin Pack Manager module:

* 19.10.1 or later
* 20.04.0 or later
* 20.10.0 or later

# The related documentation is also available online on https://docs.centreon.com/, chapter 'Plugin Packs'
information.name: Hyper-V NSCP API
